title: [SOLVED]820-3115-b powering up with green light on charger then turning of after 5 second
message:
[PLAIN][SOLVED]820-3115-b powering up with green light on charger then turning of after 5 second[/PLAIN]

820-3115-b powering up with green light on charger then turning of after 5 second and green light going of. any idea?then when i disconnect and connect again green light coming on and powering up and do this same again.

title: [SOLVED]820-3115-b powering up with green light on charger then turning of after 5 second
[SOLVED]820-3115-b powering up with green light on charger then turning of after 5 second
message:
keyboard disconnected. board is on the table.
PPBUS_G3H -12.62v
SMC_ONOFF -3.49v

title: [SOLVED]820-3115-b powering up with green light on charger then turning of after 5 second
message: also there is new sympton. there is no green light on charger after when board was turning self of but if i power it up fan will spin for 5 seconds and stop spinning.

title: [SOLVED]820-3115-b powering up with green light on charger then turning of after 5 second
message:
Was this liquid? 
When green light is gone, check for 3V42 and ACOK. Does it power on from a charged battery?

title: [SOLVED]820-3115-b powering up with green light on charger then turning of after 5 second
message: Fixed!!!    Reflow smc and works now. Thx any way
